= Details =

== Permissions ==

To access this controller, you'll need to go to the User Manager and add the "admin_controllers_configuration" and then add this permission to the groups with the users that you want to edit the TurboCare configuration.

The menu at the top of the program displays this option as "Configuration Admin".
